Name: Christmas Massacre
About the game: Larry's Christmas tree has been telling him to kill. But whose side is the tree really on? And can he trust what he's hearing? CHRISTMAS MASSACRE is an 80's inspired stealth slasher game with low-poly, PS1-style graphics. Sneak, stalk and murder your prey without being caught. You must kill without being seen to complete each level. Multiple masks and costumes Arcade style stealth Fast Forward Button Drenched with gore First and third person camera models Crusty PS1-style graphics
